appDesc.message: Professional webpage text highlighter with multi-category management, custom colors, keyboard shortcuts, context menu, drag-and-drop sorting, import/export and share code features

addToCategory.description: Context menu item to add selected text to highlight category

removeHighlight.description: Context menu item to remove highlight from selected text

newVersionFound.description: New version notification with version number

currentVersionLabel.description: Current version label with version number

updateStep1.message: 1. Click "Download Update" to download the new version

updateStep6.message: 6. Select the extracted folder to complete the update

copySuccess.description: Message shown when share code is copied

successDedupe.description: Message shown when deduplication is successful

noDuplicatesFound.description: Message shown when no duplicates are found

emptyShareCode.description: Message shown when share code input is empty

applyShareCodeConfirm.message: Are you sure you want to apply this configuration? It will be merged with your current configuration.
applyShareCodeConfirm.description: Confirmation message for applying share code

applyShareCodeSuccess.description: Message shown when share code is applied successfully

applyShareCodeError.message: Failed to apply configuration, please try again
applyShareCodeError.description: Message shown when applying share code fails

invalidShareCode.message: Invalid share code, please check and try again
invalidShareCode.description: Message shown when share code is invalid

importConfirmMessage.message: Are you sure you want to import this configuration? This will replace all your current settings.

importSuccess.description: Message shown when import is successful

importError.message: Import failed, please check file format

latestVersion.message: You are using the latest version
latestVersion.description: Message shown when no update is available

checkUpdateError.message: Failed to check for updates, please try again later
checkUpdateError.description: Message shown when checking for updates fails

noCategories.message: No categories yet, please create one
noCategories.description: Message shown when no categories exist

keywordsCount.description: Number of keywords in a category

deleteCategoryConfirm.message: Are you sure you want to delete category "$1"? This will remove all keywords in this category.
deleteCategoryConfirm.description: Confirmation message for deleting a category

addHighlightError.message: Failed to add, please try again
